--- ## 🚀 Getting Started ### For Developers 1. **Monitor Application Performance** - Start with [System Overview](#) to see overall health - Drill into [Performance Analysis](#) to find slow queries - Use [Code Browser](#) to review stored procedure code - Check [Detailed Metrics](#) for historical trends 2. **Troubleshoot Slow Queries** - Open Performance Analysis dashboard - Filter by time range when slowness occurred - Identify procedures with high duration - Review execution plans and add missing indexes 3. **Explore Database Schema** - Browse tables in [Table Browser](#) - Click table name for detailed schema - Review indexes, constraints, and relationships - Check table sizes for capacity planning ### For DBAs 1. **Daily Health Check** - Review System Overview for all instances - Check CPU and Memory gauges (should be green) - Scan for active alerts - Review overnight batch job performance 2. **Performance Tuning** - Identify top 10 slowest procedures - Analyze wait statistics (PAGEIOLATCH, LCK_M_*, etc.) - Review missing index recommendations - Optimize queries and add indexes 3. **Compliance & Security** - Monitor Audit Logging dashboard for security events - Review user activity for anomalies - Check configuration changes - Export audit logs for compliance reporting ### For Operations 1. **Incident Response** - Note exact time of incident (UTC) - Open System Overview and set time range - Check for CPU/Memory spikes - Correlate with deployment or external events - Use Performance Analysis to identify root cause 2. **Capacity Planning** - Review 30-day and 90-day trends - Calculate growth rates - Project when you'll hit 80% capacity - Budget for infrastructure upgrades --- ## 💡 Key Features

🔍 Real-Time Monitoring

Live metrics updated every 30-60 seconds with automatic refresh

🎨 Interactive Filtering

Filter by server, metric type, and time range for targeted analysis

📚 Inline Documentation

Every dashboard includes developer guides and troubleshooting tips

🔗 Smart Navigation

Click to drill down, navigate dependencies, and trace call chains

🛡️ SOC 2 Compliant

7-year audit retention, comprehensive security event logging

⚡ Performance Tools

Diagnostic queries, wait analysis, and optimization recommendations
